document.full_text: a suicide bomber blew himself up in a small restaurant in pakistan's bajaur tribal region on the afghan border on saturday, killing five civilians and wounding 10, officials said.
document.title: suicide bomber kills five in northwest pakistan
lines_and_colors: a suicide bomber blew himself up in a small restaurant in pakistan's bajaur tribal region on the afghan border on saturday, killing five civilians and wounding 10, officials said.
